content: lawrence s afghan materials ● h/5 0 mm hook ● 1 7-ounce skein red heart super saver light blue color a ● 2 7-ounce skeins red heart super saver blue color b ● 3 7-ounce skeins red heart super saver royal blue color c ● 4 7-ounce skeins red heart super saver soft navy blue color d ● yarn needle ● scissors/snips notes ● chain 4 counts as a double_crochet plus a chain ● chain 3 counts as a double_crochet ● when working double_crochet s across 2 dcs are worked in the chain-2 spaces of the previous round ● finished size is approximately 69-inches by 69-inches ● us terms are used ● sample is made using four colors it is the crocheter s choice to use multiple colors a single color etc ● a larger hook can be used but the amounts of yarn will need to be adjusted/increased to accommodate the larger hook this is an original design by doug speeckaert feel free to make and sell for profit but remember to give credit to me and link back to my blog https //dotscl com/wp v3 09162022 with color a chain 4 and slip_stitch into first chain to create loop round 1 chain 4 * 4 double_crochet into loop chain 1 repeat from * twice 3 double_crochet in loop and slip_stitch into third chain of initial chain 4 round 2 slip_stitch over to corner space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner space * double_crochet across to next corner and 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner repeat from * twice double_crochet across and slip_stitch into top of chain 3 round 3 slip_stitch over to corner space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner space * 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner space repeat from * twice 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 3 double_crochet slip_stitch into top of chain 3 round 4 slip_stitch over to corner space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner space * 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 2 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner space repeat from * twice 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 2 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 3 double_crochet slip_stitch into top of chain 3 round 5 slip_stitch over to corner space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner space * 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 6 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner space repeat from * twice 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 6 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 3 double_crochet slip_stitch into top of chain 3 round 6 slip_stitch over to corner space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner space * 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 10 double_crochet chain
